title: N.Korea Wants Compensation from Japan for Capsized Trawler
text:
North Korea on Saturday demanded compensation from Japan for a fishing trawler that capsized when it rammed a Japanese patrol ship on the East Sea on Oct. 7.

A North Korean Foreign Ministry spokesman told the official Korean Central News Agency that the patrol ship committed "a gangster act" by sinking the fishing boat, which it claimed was sailing on a "normal navigation" course on the East Sea.

"We strongly demand that the Japanese government compensate for the infliction of the material damage by sinking our vessel and that it work out steps to prevent a recurrence of such incident," he added.
